short_summary: The National Defence Purchasing and Supply Service is seeking telecommunication and electronics equipment from bidders.
description: A purchase order for equipment purchase has been issued. Suppliers have to create detailed quotes. Suppliers can only submit multiple times after the announcement deadline. Requirements may change and new documentation may be added. Users can submit queries directly using the email address provided. Private users won't be able to view the request through standard EBTI screen and may not be able to view agreements and will have to accept user agreement. Bidders are flush that the process will remain integrated into the tendering module. The contractual and legal sections of the order hold priority items.
full_summary:
---

**Title:** Electrical Cables and Connectors
### Title(French): Câbles et connecteurs électronique

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029837

**Publication Date:** 2023-03-13
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-31T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
### Avis Type: Demande de propositions

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
### Méthode d’approvisionnement : Concurrentielle - Appel d’offres sélectif

**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
### Accords commerciaux : Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
### Régions d'opportunité : Canada

**Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR)
### Régions de livraison : Québec (sauf RCN)

**Contact Information:**
Name: Caroline Savoie
Email: [Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Caroline.Savoie@forces.gc.ca)
Address: 202 Workshop Depot, Bldg. 10 South Commercial Reception, 6769 Notre Dame East St, Montreal, QC, H1N 2E9

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of electrical cables and connectors. The delivery is requested at 202 Workshop Depot in Montreal, Quebec, by April 30, 2023. Only qualified suppliers can bid.

**Items:**

1. GSIN: N5335, NSN: 5335-01-677-9998, Backshell, Electrical Connector
2. GSIN: N5935, NSN: 5935-01-669-9499, Backshell, Electrical Connector
3. GSIN: N6145, NSN: 6145-00-918-9494, Cable, Radio Frequency
4. GSIN: N6145, NSN: 6145-00-823-2544, Cable, Radio Frequency
5. GSIN: N5935, NSN: 5935-00-660-4296, Connector, Plug, Electrical
6. GSIN: N5935, NSN: 5935-01-043-0629, Connector, Plug, Electrical
7. GS
